attributes.action: That contracts  of employment should be made unalterable withiout explicit agreement of one of the two parties to it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Contracts should be made inviolable and unalterable unless BOTH parties agree.
No agreement should mean no alteration for the life of the contract(unless agreed.)
There should be NO giving of notice of change and alteration to a contract because this is ONE SIDED.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
